title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 580.17 - Ex parte communications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 580.17 - Ex parte communications

State Regulations
(a) No
party shall, directly or through a representative, communicate with the hearing
officer designated for any particular hearing, in connection with any issue of
fact or law involved in any pending application, except upon notice and
opportunity for all parties to participate. (b) Hearing officers requested to hear and
report may have the aid and advice of agency staff other than the staff which
has been or is engaged in the investigative or prosecuting functions in
connection with the case under consideration or a similar case. (c) Section
587.4
of this Title, concerning ex
parte communications with the agency, shall also apply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
580.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
